verses.verse: Therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> we ought<WG1163> to give the more<WG4056> earnest<WG4056> heed<WG4337> to the things which we have heard,<WG191> lest<WG3379> at<WG3379> any<WG3379> time<WG4218> we should let them slip.<WG3901>

For if<WG1487> the word<WG3056> spoken<WG2980> by angels<WG32> was steadfast,<WG949> and every<WG3956> transgression<WG3847> and disobedience<WG3876> received<WG2983> a just<WG1738> recompense<WG3405> of reward;<WG3405>

How<WG4459> shall we escape,<WG1628> if we neglect<WG272> so<WG5082> great<WG5082> salvation;<WG4991> which<WG3748> at the first<WG746> began<WG746> <WG2983> to be spoken<WG2980> by the Lord,<WG2962> and was confirmed<WG950> to us by them that heard<WG191> him;

God<WG2316> also<WG4901> bearing<WG4901> them witness,<WG4901> both<WG5037> with signs<WG4592> and wonders,<WG5059> and with divers<WG4164> miracles,<WG1411> and gifts<WG3311> of the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> according<WG2596> to his own will?<WG2308>
For to the angels<WG32> has he not put<WG5293> in subjection<WG5293> the world<WG3625> to come,<WG3195> whereof<WG4012> <WG3739> we speak.<WG2980>

But one<WG5100> in a certain<WG4225> place testified,<WG1263> saying,<WG3004> What<WG5101> is man,<WG444> that you are mindful<WG3403> of him? or<WG2228> the son<WG5207> of man <WG444>that you visit<WG1980> him?

You made<WG1642> him a little<WG1024> lower<WG1642> than<WG3844> the angels;<WG32> you crowned<WG4737> him with glory<WG1391> and honor,<WG5092> and did set<WG2525> him over<WG1909> the works<WG2041> of your hands:<WG5495>

You have put<WG5293> all<WG3956> things in subjection<WG5293> under<WG5270> his feet.<WG4228> For in that he put<WG5293> all<WG3956> in subjection<WG5293> under him, he left<WG863> nothing<WG3762> that is not put<WG506> under<WG506> him. But now<WG3568> we see<WG3708> not yet<WG3768> all<WG3956> things put<WG5293> under<WG5293> him.

But we see<WG991> Jesus,<WG2424> who<WG3588> was made<WG1642> a little<WG1024> lower<WG1642> than<WG3844> the angels<WG32> for the suffering<WG3804> of death,<WG2288> crowned<WG4737> with glory<WG1391> and honor;<WG5092> that he by the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> should taste<WG1089> death<WG2288> for every<WG3956> man.

For it became<WG4241> him, for whom<WG3739> are all<WG3956> things, and by whom<WG3739> are all<WG3956> things, in bringing<WG71> many<WG4183> sons<WG5207> to glory,<WG1391> to make<WG5055> the captain<WG747> of their salvation<WG4991> perfect<WG5048> through<WG1223> sufferings.<WG3804>

For both<WG5037> he that sanctifies<WG37> and they who are sanctified<WG37> are all<WG3956> of one:<WG1520> for which<WG3739> cause<WG156> he is not ashamed<WG1870> to call<WG2564> them brothers,<WG80>
Saying,<WG3004> I will declare<WG518> your name<WG3686> to my brothers,<WG80> in the middle<WG3319> of the church<WG1577> will I sing<WG5214> praise<WG5214> to you.
And again,<WG3825> I will put<WG3982> my trust<WG3982> in him. And again,<WG3825> Behold<WG2400> I and the children<WG3813> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> has given<WG1325> me.

For as much<WG1893> then<WG3767> as the children<WG3813> are partakers<WG2841> of flesh<WG4561> and blood,<WG129> he also<WG2532> himself<WG846> likewise<WG3898> took<WG3348> part<WG3348> of the same;<WG846> that through<WG1223> death<WG2288> he might destroy<WG2673> him that had<WG2192> the power<WG2904> of death,<WG2288> that is, the devil;<WG1228>
And deliver<WG525> them who<WG3745> through fear<WG5401> of death<WG2288> were all<WG3956> their lifetime<WG2198> subject<WG1777> to bondage.<WG1397>
For truly<WG1222> he took<WG1949> not on<WG1949> him the nature of angels;<WG32> but he took<WG1949> on<WG1949> him the seed<WG4690> of Abraham.<WG11>

Why<WG3606> in all<WG3956> things it behooved<WG3784> him to be made<WG3666> like<WG3666> to his brothers,<WG80> that he might be a merciful<WG1655> and faithful<WG4103> high<WG749> priest<WG749> in things pertaining to God,<WG2316> to make<WG2433> reconciliation<WG2433> for the sins<WG266> of the people.<WG2992>
For in that he himself<WG846> has suffered<WG3958> being tempted,<WG3985> he is able<WG1410> to succor<WG997> them that are tempted.<WG3985>
